site.title: America's Mobility of the Future
site.description: An exhibition of the mobility of the future, enabling the transfer of knowledge and the exchange of experiences, as a meeting point for industry, politics and users.

home.slogan: The Fair of the <span>Mobility of the Future
home.description: Americas' mobility of the future is the showcase for the mobility of the future, with a comprehensive program of keynotes, panel discussions and project presentations, seeking to develop the intersection between the current form of mobility and the future of mobility; Industry 4.0. Learn about the latest advances in the electromobility industry, smart cities and mobility technology developments on the exhibition floor.
home.description1: Demonstration of technological advances and innovative products from key players who are laying the foundations for the development of the mobility of the future.
home.description2: Conferences and panel discussions that serve as a meeting point between industry, policy and users to attract and complement the value chain, as well as the public policies needed to move towards a more sustainable mobility.
home.why_participe1: Learn from international experts and decision makers.
home.why_participe2: Drives the transition and transformation of the mobility of the future in Mexico.
home.why_participe3: Access to the latest technologies for sustainable mobility.
home.why_participe4: Discover business opportunities and potential in smart mobility.
home.why_participe5: Explore what's new in sustainable infrastructure.
home.visitor_profile1: Manufacturers and assemblers of automobiles, trucks, buses, streetcars and motorcycles
home.visitor_profile2: Manufacturers and assemblers of bicycles, scooters, drones and other last-mile personal mobility vehicles.
home.visitor_profile3: Tier 1, Tier 2 automotive suppliers and OEMs
home.visitor_profile4: Tier 1, Tier 2 aerospace suppliers and OEMs
home.visitor_profile5: Suppliers to the infrastructure and road safety sector
home.visitor_profile8: Engineers specializing in smart cities and sustainable urban planning
home.visitor_profile9: Experts in mobility and urban planning
home.visitor_profile11: Real estate and shopping center developers
home.category1: Mobility of the future, transportation and light vehicles
home.category1_1: Efficient vehicles, hybrids, plug-in hybrids, electric, autonomous, hydrogen, solar.
home.category2_7: Clean Fuel Program Management Solutions (Clean Fuel Program Management)
home.category3_4: Intelligent traffic management services and smart intersections
home.category3_5: Intelligent services for traffic management on highways and roads
home.category4: Ecosystem for electric mobility & service providers
home.category4_10: Consulting services and smart urban development

about_amof.description1: Promoting current political, economic and social discussions on the mobility of the future.
about_amof.description3: comprehensive lectures, panel discussions and project presentations, accompanied by an exhibition and technology demonstration floor.
